title: Janna Mastery Not Working Correctly
body: When using the mastery animation on Janna, (Using Forecast Janna skin, not sure if that makes a difference) it does not correctly show above the health bar. Instead, it appears between it, therefore blocking the view of some of it. http://imgur.com/hCNTFxY http://imgur.com/Pm6tlkZ

replies.body:
Hiya! 

We are aware of mastery icons being covered by some health bars for various skins/champions. The team working on masteries is aware of the issue and are working towards a solution. :)
hey Riot KateyKhaos, do you happen to know when the bug is gonna fix? Im a lvl 7 janna main and it's hiding behind my health bar. Please...
Same with Vel'koz and Kayle. As someone who mains Vel'koz and uses Janna as his main support, this upsets me.
